attributes.action: Consider restoration of AyrStation Hotel before demolition is undertaken.
attributes.additional_details:
The people need to know that there is an alternative to demolition of this building. 
Other places similar have been restored and have helped beautify their immediate surroundings. ( Lime Street Station in Liverpool/ the Balmoral In Edinburgh)
attributes.background: Alert public to alternatives to demolition of this historic station. London expert reports clearly show that restoration is possible. It would cost less to restore than to demolish.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about restoration of building with historical significance are a matter for the relevant landowners and planning authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
